personality_communication_profile.role_in_deal: Key influencer and orchestrator of internal approvals, likely a primary decision-maker or very close to it.

intent_sentiment.tone_patterns: Professional, direct, appreciative, firm, and increasingly decisive/enthusiastic as the deal progresses

objections_concerns.objection_frequency_severity: Low frequency (2 distinct objections), low severity (easily addressed, not deal-breakers)

communication_behavior.engagement_level: High (initiates contact, asks specific questions, provides internal updates, suggests channel change, sets clear timelines)
communication_behavior.message_complexity: Concise but clear, professional and to the point

deal_dynamics_risk_assessment.budget_risk_indicators: Low risk (no direct mentions of budget constraints or pushback; discount already reflected)
deal_dynamics_risk_assessment.timeline_risk_indicators: Low risk (Sophia is actively setting and pushing for a clear timeline)
deal_dynamics_risk_assessment.churn_risk_indicators: Very low churn risk (high engagement, quick responses, clear communication, active participation in resolving blockers, setting next steps)

deal_insights.key_objections: Minor legal clause adjustment (termination notice period) and clarification on implementation support inclusion.
deal_insights.decision_maker_status: Highly influential, orchestrating internal sign-offs; acts as the primary conduit and driver for the deal, likely a key decision-maker or holds significant authority to push it through.
deal_insights.urgency_level: High urgency (actively pushing for Friday signature deadline and August 5th onboarding)
deal_insights.competitive_position: Strong, favorable position (no mention of competitors; focus is on internal approvals and closing this deal)
